spiritsExplanation: The workout is classified as "High-Energy & Intense" with very high confidence (score: 0.95) as the title highlights "BEST OF HIIT" and "INTENSE," and the description repeatedly emphasizes its high-energy nature, involving "dripping sweat," "super high energy songs," and intense calorie burn (80-160 kcal in 10 minutes).
